overview: (BASED ON A TRUE) STORY Two mimes, their dog, and a part human part camera chaperone come to Tinseltown with open hearts and big dreams of producing their visionary film. We Saw Ourselves Dreaming. Though. despite their creative aspirations and genuine effort, the mimes quickly fall victim to a whirlwind of scams and close encounters on their rollercoaster ride through a hyperreal Hollywood.
title: We Saw Ourselves Dreaming
